text:
Legal Tracker (Thomson Reuters) | Senior Software Engineer (.NET JavaScript) | US | REMOTE, FULLTIME, https://legaltracker.com/ These are WFH positions but you must live in the US and have proper work authorization. You will join a entire team of full time remote web developers, working with ASP.NET, JavaScript, SQL Server, NServiceBus, Azure, etc. in very well established product in the legal matter management space. We've been exclusively remote for well over a decade, with great success.

We are hiring for these roles:

- Senior Software Engineer

- Lead Software Engineer

Please contact me (sergio.pereira@tr.com) for more details and specific question. Unfortunately at this time we really cannot consider candidates from outside of the US.
